mapper.select: select A.*, rank() over(order by A.sales_date desc) from ( select p.*, g.pd_img_no, g.pd_category img_category, g.original_filename, g.renamed_filename from product p left join pd_img g on p.pd_no = g.pd_no where g.pd_category = 'R' order by p.pd_sales desc ) A where rownum < 9

select A.*, rank() over(order by A.sales_date desc) from ( select p.*, g.pd_img_no, g.pd_category img_category, g.original_filename, g.renamed_filename from product p left join pd_img g on p.pd_no = g.pd_no where g.pd_category = 'R' order by p.sales_date desc ) A where rownum < 9

select A.*, rank() over(order by A.sales_date desc) from ( select p.*, g.pd_img_no, g.pd_category img_category, g.original_filename, g.renamed_filename from product p left join pd_img g on p.pd_no = g.pd_no where g.pd_category = 'R' order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) A where rownum < 9

select p.*, g.pd_img_no, g.pd_category img_category, g.original_filename, g.renamed_filename, o.option_no, o.option_name from product p left join pd_img g on p.pd_no = g.pd_no left join pd_option o on o.pd_no = p.pd_no where p.pd_no = #{no}
